name: Treasure Hunt (SleepyKabo)
description:
It all started as a rumor. There is a miracle treasure that can grant any wish! After adventuring and leveling up, you finally found the location of the treasure. Would you be able to get through the obstacles to the treasure?

This is a silly game I made within Visual Novel Maker to better understand the engine. All art is original and music/sfx from VNM dlc's.

There are 3 endings, of which 2 are similar, just different visuals.

I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it.
